title: IT campus hiring to soar 25% this fiscal led by TCS, Infosys & Wipro
description: Experts say the hiring of fresh talent is a positive sign for the IT sector, which reduced or paused fresh intakes from campuses last year amid global economic uncertainties and to stabilise their workforces after aggressive hiring during the pandemic.
content: IT campus hiring is expected to surge 20-25% this fiscal, backed by growing demand for talent in AI, cybersecurity, cloud computing, and data analytics, industry experts told ET. Companies are likely to bolster their workforces led by top software services firms such as Tata Consultancy Services, Infosys, Wipro, HCLTech, Tech Mahindra.
